title: Video Document-Based Science Learning Process Design: Applying Instrumental Genesis Theory in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of core scientific concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Students analyze science theory application cases via video documentation, progressing through 15-minute mobile learning modules

learning_goals: Learners can extract core scientific concepts with 80% accuracy by analyzing video documentation of experimental processes
Learners can perform a three-step design process to transform video documentation into learning tools by applying instrumental genesis theory
Learners can document science content reconstruction processes with over 90% completeness through peer review and self-reflection
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
